description:
This studio based module marks the last of four subsequent master-level core studios in landscape design. The final MLA studio is regarded as opportunity for the graduating students to deliver their personal 'master piece'. The students will undertake projects in one of the countries of South East Asia, tackling landscape design issues in the fast growing urban agglomerations of this region. The
studio integrates ecological, social and economic thinking in the course of generation of designs that shall be realistic and workable.
title: MLA Studio: Region
